messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

incidents logged as complaints widget to be updated service now dashboard incidents logged complaints widget be updated dashboard hello looking number tickets logged complaints for month could incident below updated changed improvement ticket complaint nonetheless still appears dashboard under number incidents logged complaints widget could you please be kind make necessary amendments incident longer part list kindly ensure number tickets logged incidents for month october accurately displayed case you require additional information please let know thank you customer care en

I am also considering "Miscellaneous," but "Internal Project" seems more precise given the context. I'm focusing on the nature of the task described in the ticket.
